msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, the thing that catches my eye the most in this room is your . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Who designed it? What made you place it here? How much does it cost? I have so many questions.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm totally digging the you've got here <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is it made with local mushrooms? If I licked it would it taste like mushrooms? Have you licked it? Sorry, I'm a bit obsessed!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, I'm not a scientist, but your is kinda freaking me out. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />How does the ice never melt?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My zen goes up 20 percent any time I'm in a house with like this. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe instead of constantly saying , I should be, like, OMMMMM
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! I'm getting mega nostalgia looking at your here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Cancan I come over and play with those blocks sometime?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, that wood grain texture on your is sick! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Wait, it's made out of REAL wood?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, I'm getting a flashback to my school days just looking at your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Please tell me there isn't going to be a test.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Cabana boy! I'll take a salty on the rocks!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh, my bad. I thought I was at an all-inclusive resort because of your !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow, you're really set up for some serious business in here with . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I didn't know you were such an entrepreneur. We should go into business together. The ideas I have
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, did you build your all by yourself? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's so rugged and outdoorsy. And both of those adjectives are SO hot right now.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aww, what an adorable little .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's cool that you can appreciate that kind of style. Not everyone is so open-minded.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yo, do you really have made of fruit? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I didn't know that was possible! This changes everything!<10_4 /> OK, that may be overstating it.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow, you've got a real in here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm all about vintage stuff too. Got a whole warehouse of junk that I'm hoping will be vintage in 30 years!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm getting some weird feelings looking at your old
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Isis this nostalgia? But I don't want to be a kid again!Kids can't wear designer jeans and promote their own line of artisanal fragrances!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Well, I've never been so inspired by !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Seriously, if you can make furniture out of shells, you can make ANYTHING out of shells

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, what an extravagant . Fancy!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I love the interplay of iron and wood Did that make me sound like a fancy furniture critic?<10_4 /> Good!

<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I'm sorry. I just have to take a moment to applaud your sense of design, . <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The sheer essence of your adds color to your place. But so do the, you know, actual colors.
